overview: It started with a 999 call from a lorry driver in Essex and ended in one of the UKâ€™s biggest ever police investigations, a hunt for those responsible for the deaths of 39 Vietnamese migrants. Spanning Britain, Europe and Vietnam, this film shows how detectives cracked open a multimillion-pound international smuggling ring with its roots in a seemingly innocuous haulage business in the heart of Northern Ireland.
title: Hunting the Essex Lorry Killers
